choices.A: It enables the use of HTML and CSS in web development.
choices.B: It enables the use of external libraries through npm.
choices.C: It keeps the UI (in DOM) in sync with the state (held in JavaScript) automatically.
choices.D: It secretly sprinkles fairy dust for dynamic animations.
